#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
int main()
{
	ll l,ans(0),k,flag(0),diff,i;
	char num[100010];
	
	cin >> num;
	l = strlen(num);
	if(l<=2)
	{
		ans = atoi(num);
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	else
	{
		ans = 99 + 90*(l-3);
		num[0] = num[0] - 1;
		ans = ans + (10)*((num[0]) - '0') + (num[1]) - '0';
		num[0] = num[0] + 1;
		diff = (10 + num[1] - num[0])%10;
		for(i=2;i<l;i++)
		{
			if((num[1] + diff*(i-1)- '0')%10 == num[i]-'0')
				continue;
			else if((num[1] + diff*(i-1)- '0')%10 < num[i]-'0')
			{
				flag=1;
				ans++;
				break;
			}
			else
			{
				flag=1;
				break;
			}
			
		}
		if(flag == 0)
			ans++;
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
